title: David Bowie font ID
content:
I looking for the font that is used for the name "Heroes" David Bowie.  
I have the name on the tip of my tongue, but i still can't remember it.

[http://www.rollingstone.com/assets/images/album\_review/david-bowies-the-next-day-001-1361815326.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150401015115/http:/www.rollingstone.com/assets/images/album_review/david-bowies-the-next-day-001-1361815326.jpg)
author: K.P.

comments.content:
Doctrine  
 [http://virusfonts.com/news/2013/01/david-bowie-the-next-day-that-album-c...](http://web.archive.org/web/20150401015115/http:/virusfonts.com/news/2013/01/david-bowie-the-next-day-that-album-cover-design/ "http://virusfonts.com/news/2013/01/david-bowie-the-next-day-that-album-cover-design/")

EDIT:  
Oops, I saw only your image and didn’t read your post.

Why didn’t you post the original?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150401015115im_/http:/typophile.com/files/David-Bowie-Heroes-510603_6363.jpg)

It was released in 1977. So the type is pre-digital.  
Best match is probably [Eagle](http://web.archive.org/web/20150401015115/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontbureau/eagle/).

You're right it is Eagle! I didn't know that is was a reproduction of a old album cover ;-)

Thank you!
